I think it is refreshing to see someone come forward with such honesty and =
vulnerability . . . Psychological help??=A0 I think he was just trying his =
best to show us the entire picture from his view . . . I admire him for bei=
ng honest in a world of strangers . . .
=A0
How many times have I been told=
 that I need psychological help because I hear voices coming from a radio s=
hack box??=A0 A few too many. . . `
=A0
Suzanne
